ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is a great course for those who are interested in OOP and learning C++.
Yes, I would highly recommend the course for students who are interested in learning C++ and OOP.
If you have not learnt C++ and want to learn it with a reasonable amount of homework, this is the course.
Very easy course. I would recommend it to anybody who wants an intro to c++ or OOP in general

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course sharpens my programming skills and helps me a lot for my research combining C++ with other languages.
The course is helpful to my research by improving my programming knowledge and skills.
Since I am using C++ in my simulations of my research, this course is very helpful for reading and writing my own codes. The course give hands-on help on coding.
